attributes.action: The creation of a website for customer reviews (similar to TripAdvisor) for local and central government services
attributes.additional_details:
The creation of a website for customer reviews (similar to TripAdvisor) for local and central government services.

This would enable every user of government services to rank at various levels:

1. Department level
2. Sub-department level
3. Individual named manager / department head level.

This service accountability at its finest.
